events.message: I was involved in a car collision yesterday and am filing a claim for the damages to my vehicle.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident based on the report of vehicle collision provided by the customer.
An insurance agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and communication regarding this auto accident claim.
We have acknowledged receipt of your claim and our team is beginning the review process to assist you efficiently.
Please provide photos of the vehicle damage, police report, and a repair estimate to continue processing your claim.
The customer has submitted all requested documents including photos, police report, and repair estimates promptly.
Our claims team has started the investigation process to verify the details and extent of the vehicle collision damage.
Investigation into the auto accident has been completed confirming the eligibility of damages claimed by the insured.
We have proposed a settlement amount based on the repair estimates and market values for the vehicle damage.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the handling of the claim.
The claim has been officially approved, and the payout will be processed shortly to cover the repair costs.
Insurance payment was issued to the policyholderâ€™s account to cover the approved settlement amount for the accident.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after settlement payment and customer confirmation of repair.
All documents and claim records have been archived securely for this auto accident case per company policy.
